Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.expr.functions

Interface Summary
IAeFunctionValidator Interface for code that validates the syntax of a function, adding any errors to the AeExpressionValidationResult passed in.
IAeFunctionValidatorFactory  
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractActiveBpelExtensionFunctionValidator Base class for all ActiveBPEL extension functions
AeAbstractFunctionValidator Base class for function validators
AeAbstractFunctionValidatorFactory Provides lookup of validator given a function qname.
AeAbstractFunctionValidatorFactory.AeBPWSFunctionValidatorFactory  
AeAbstractFunctionValidatorFactory.AeWSBPELFunctionValidatorFactory  
AeBase64EncodeFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function base64Encode(string)
AeBPWSFunctionUsedInWSBPELValidator Pass through validator that also reports an info message that the function being used isn't appropriate for this version of BPEL.
AeCopyAllAttachmentsFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function copyAllAttachments(fromVariableNames, toVariableName)
AeCopyAttachmentFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function copyAttachment(fromVariableName, fromItemNumber, toVariableName)
AeCreateAttachmentFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function createAttachment(variableName, contentType, content, [contentId])
AeDelegatingFunctionValidator Delegating function validator.
AeDoXslTransformFunctionValidator Validates the bpel:doXslTransform() function doXslTransform('string', $var/my/xpath, 'name', 'value', 'n2', $x, 'n3', count($y/some/path) )
AeGetAttachmentCountFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getAttachmentCount(variableName)
AeGetAttachmentPropertyFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getAttachmentProperty(variableName, itemNumber, propertyName)
AeGetAttachmentSizeFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getAttachmentSize(variableName, itemNumber)
AeGetAttachmentTypeFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getAttachmentType(variableName, itemNumber)
AeGetLinkStatusFunctionValidator Validates the bpws standard getLinkStatus function
AeGetMyRolePropertyFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getMyRoleProperty(partnerLinkName, operationName, [,path])
AeGetProcessIdFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getProcessId().
AeGetProcessNameFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function getProcessName().
AeGetVariableDataFunctionValidator Validates the standard bpws getVariableData() function
AeGetVariablePropertyFunctionValidator Validates the standard bpws and wsbpel getVariableProperty functions
AeRemoveAllAttachmentsFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function removeAllAttachments(variableNames)
AeRemoveAttachmentFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function removeAttachment(variableName, itemNumber)
AeReplaceAttachmentFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function replaceAttachment(fromVariableName, fromItemNumber, toVariableName, toItemNumber)
AeResolveURNFunctionValidator Validates the ActiveBPEL extension function resolveURN(urnVariable)
AeWSBPELFunctionUsedInBPWSValidator Pass through validator that also reports an error message that the function being used isn't appropriate for this version of BPEL.
